mapper.select: SELECT reply_table.id, reply_table.article_id AS articleId, reply_table.account_id AS accountId, account_table.nickname, reply_table.content, reply_table.regdate FROM reply_table JOIN account_table ON reply_table.account_id = account_table.id WHERE reply_table.article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply_table VALUES( reply_seq.nextval, #{articleId}, #{accountId}, #{content}, sysdate )
